page.content:
Neptune Investement Novices Hurdle Race Card

We will have a comprehensive race card for the Neptune Novices Hurdle right here on race day and it will be a must see for any punters before having a bet on the race. It will have all the details for each horse including their form line, odds, colours and connection details for each of the runners of the Neptune Novices Hurdle this year. It is the second race on the card on Day 2 of the Cheltenham Festival and it always attracts the best novice hurdlers over 2m 5f.

Neptune Novices Race Card 2013
